alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 12:07PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe and Hendry Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1206 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking developing strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Harbor to Dade-Collier Training Airport to near Wilderness Waterway. Movement was west at 15 to 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Montura, Wilderness Waterway, Hendry Correctional, Loop Road Ee Center, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Big Cypress National Preserve, Dade-Collier Training Airport, Devils Garden, Miccosukee Indian Reservation and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Miami. You can also share your report with NWS Miami on Facebook and Twitter.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe
